EmailTemplate.name: EB-11-10-202211-EMP-CHTPA-NSWLTR-Partner-Essentials-Newsletter-TPA.Partner-Essen
EmailTemplate.subject: Individualized diabetes management yields real results
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Partner Essentials FEATURED Committed to innovative diabetes management To recognize Diabetes Awareness Month this November, Teladoc Health wants to reaffirm our commitment to designing industry-leading diabetes management solutions that provide real results for users. With 6 in 10 U.S. adults living with a chronic condition such as diabetes or hypertension,1 it’s more important than ever to offer affordable, accessible and high‑impact support. Teladoc Health chronic care programs are the only virtual care solutions on the market that combine clinical expertise with a data-driven approach to deliver sustained behavior change for users. EVENTS HLTH 2022 <[[https://www.hlth.com/2022event]]> November 13-16 | Las Vegas, NV Join us at HLTH and be sure to attend our featured sessions: Results, Innovation and Equity: Laying the Ground for Whole‑Person Care Jason Gorevic, CEO, Teladoc Health Tuesday, November 15 | 10:10 a.m. Pacific | Seaport Stage Real-World Results of Whole‑Person Virtual Care Dr. Vidya Raman-Tangella, Chief Medical Officer, Teladoc Health, and Dr. Rajiv Patel, President of Health Care Enterprises Provider Strategy at Centene Monday, November 14 | 11:00 a.m. Pacific | Impact Pavilion RESOURCES When it comes to diabetes, no two paths are the same because no two individuals are the same <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/resources/article/when-it-comes-to-diabetes-no-two-paths-are-the-same/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=vidya-article&utm_term=&utm_campaign=november-partner-essentials-tpa&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Research shows that an individualized solution is the best way to help manage diabetes. Creating lasting behavior change through personalized engagement <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/case-study/creating-lasting-behavior-change-through-personalized-engagement/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=sap-case-study&utm_term=&utm_campaign=november-partner-essentials-tpa&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Learn how SAP empowered its employees to engage in virtual chronic condition management programs. Member testimonial: meet Dave <[[https://teladochealth.com/resources/video/member-testimonial-dave/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=newsletter&utm_content=member-story-dave&utm_term=&utm_campaign=november-partner-essentials-tpa&utm_campaign_id=/]]> Watch Dave’s story and find out how he uses virtual care to manage his type 2 diabetes. IN THE NEWS Teladoc Health CEO on potential M&A, cost cutting and more <[[https://digitalhealth.modernhealthcare.com/transformation/teladoc-ceo-potential-ma-cost-cutting-and-more]]> Teladoc Health is providing free virtual healthcare services to Florida residents impacted by Hurricane Ian <[[https://teladochealth.com/newsroom/press/release/Teladoc-Health-Is-Providing-Free-Virtual-Health-Care-Services-to-Florida-Residents-Impacted-by-Hurricane-Ian/]]>* Teladoc Health named one of Fortune’s “Best Workplaces in Health Care™” for 2022 <[[https://www.greatplacetowork.com/best-workplaces/health-care/2022]]> How SAP leans on telemedicine to deliver whole‑person care <[[https://www.benefitnews.com/news/teladoc-helps-sap-deliver-whole-person-care]]> *We are dedicated to helping anyone affected by natural disasters and encourage those who need support to reach out to us anytime through our disaster hotline <[[https://www.teladoc.com/disaster-hotline/]]>. FAST FACT Enrolling in a mental health program is the greatest contributor to improved clinical outcomes for members enrolled in Teladoc Health’s Chronic Condition Management Plus solution.2 1Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. "Chronic Disease in America." Accessed October 18, 2022. https://www.cdc.gov/chronicdisease/tools/infographics.htm
2Teladoc Health. "Multi-program chronic condition solutions amplify outcomes." About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
